ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class RingSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.RingSearch

  • public class RingSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the two motors of the ring grabbing mechanism.
    Author:
    Sophie Deng, Edward Huang

      void disableTunnel(boolean immediateReturn)
      This method lifts the two ring grabbers to put the robot back to the starting position

      This method makes the robot drop the ring by moving the motors up and down
